name: Hotel & Suites Quinta Magna
address: Av. Vallarta 4845 Col Prados Vallarta, 45020 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Offering free WiFi, free private parking and air-conditioned rooms with cable TV, this hotel is across the street from Los Cubos Monument. Guadalajara’s historic centre is 15 minutes' drive away. The spacious rooms at Quinta Magna Hotel & Suites are decorated in light colours and have tiled floors. Each room includes a safe and a private bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests can order drinks and snacks from room service. The hotel is within a 5-minute drive of Metropolitano Park and the Plaza Mexico and Gran Plaza Shopping Centres. Expo Guadalajara Trade Fair is 4 km away.

name: Camino Real Guadalajara
address: Av Vallarta No. 5005 Col. Chapalita, 48300 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: This modern hotel is located next to the Camara de Comercio and it is 1 km from Guadalajara’s La Gran Plaza Shopping Centre. Set around an attractive garden with a pool, all rooms have a terrace. The air-conditioned rooms at the Camino Real Guadalajara feature elegant décor. Each one comes with satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel’s La Huerta Restaurant serves traditional Mexican food and offers great views of the garden. An international brunch is served on Sundays. Expo-Guadalajara Convention Centre is an 8-minute drive from the Camino Real, and there is easy access as it is located between 2 of Guadalajara’s main roads. The airport is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Dali Plaza Ejecutivo
address: Av. Pedro Moreno N. 570 Col. Centro, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: This 4-star hotel is just a 3 minute walk from the Guadalajara Cathedral. Hotel Dali Plaza Ejecutivo features an on-site lounge, free Wi-Fi and air conditioned rooms. Guest rooms include cable TV and a work desk. Free local telephone calls can be made from every room. Each room provides a private bathroom, and room service can be ordered from several nearby restaurants. The Dali Plaza Ejecutivo Hotel is downtown Guadalajara near many of the city’s attractions. Guests are a 10-minute walk from shopping at Mercado de San Juan de Dios and 5 minutes from Teatro Degollado. The Guadalajara Zoo is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Casino Plaza
description: Nestled in the heart of Guadalajara, Mexico near the Metropolitan Cathedral, this hotel offers free wireless internet access, free on-site parking and an international restaurant. Hotel Casino Plaza offers easy access to many local attractions. Guests can view modern ceramic art at the Museo Regional de Ceramica or browse the unique shops at the Mercado Libertad. Concerts and amateur musicians can also be enjoyed at the nearby Plaza de Armas. Guests of the Casino Plaza Hotel will enjoy the DVD players and Safety Deposit Boxes in each room. Dinner can also be enjoyed in the privacy of the room with the hotel's room service.

name: Hvh By Yaxché
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Guadalajara, HVH by Yaxché offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from Guadalajara Cathedral. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Popular points of interest near HVH by Yaxché include Expiatorio Temple, Cabanas Cultural Institute and Revolution Park. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Real Inn Guadalajara Expo
address: Av Mariano Otero 1326, Esq De Las Rosas, 44510 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Real Inn Guadalajara Expo contemporary architecture is influenced by Mexican designs, evidenced through several textures and colours thus creating an excellent venue for lodging and banquets with top-notch technology in the hospitality industry. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire property. Stock Cafe, located on the ground floor of the hotel, offers a selection of Mexican and international cuisine. This includes pastas and pizzas cooked with firewood, an outstanding seafood bar, meats, poultry, grilled fish, carpaccios and traditional Italian appetizers. An excellent location in the commercial heart of the city, across the street from Expo Guadalajara, 10 minutes away from downtown. The hotel is located 25 minutes drive away from the Miguel Hidalgo y Costilla International Airport.

name: Guadalajara Plaza Expo Business Class
description: Guadalajara Plaza Expo located in the business area of Guadalajara, 50 meters from Expo Guadalajara, 40 minutes from the airport, 20 minutes from the historic center and 3 blocks from plaza del sol, offers 172 Executive rooms and 32 luxury rooms, restaurant, lobby bar, fitness center, covered Parking-Valet parking travel agency and business center.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Plaza Diana
address: Av Circunv Agustin Yanez 2760, 45130 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Located in Guadalajara’s financial centre, this hotel is less than 10 minutes’ drive from Expo Guadalajara Convention Centre. It offers free parking, free Wi-Fi and an indoor pool with hot tub. Hotel Plaza Diana is 4.5 km from the city centre and the cathedral. The Minerva monument is only 2 blocks away, while Andares shopping mall is 5 minutes’ drive away. Each room at Plaza Diana features stylish décor in warm tones, and includes a safe, a flat-screen TV and a coffee maker. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer, luxury toiletries and bathrobes. Room service is available. Offering services like dry cleaning and laundry, this hotel also has several meeting rooms and computers free to use. The on-site restaurant, La Milonga, serves a buffet breakfast and á la carte menu. Guadalajara International Aiport is 21.5 km away, and there is a shuttle service available at an extra cost.

name: Hg Hotel
description: Located 16 minutes’ drive from the Historic Centre and Degollado Theatre, HG Hotel offers massages and a fitness centre, plus free WiFi is available. It also has concierge services and a restaurant. The rooms here will provide you with cable TV, air conditioning and a balcony. Featuring a shower, the private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Guadalajara’s Historic centre offers a variety of restaurants and eateries from which guests can choose to explore. At HG Hotel you will find a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered include a tour desk and luggage storage. The property offers free parking. The hotel is 9 minutes’ drive from Guadalajara Expo, 16 minutes’ drive from Morelos Park and 30 minutes’ drive from Guadalajara International Airport.

name: Hotel Clarum 101
description: Located a 15-minute drive from central Guadalajara, Mexico, this modern boutique hotel offers free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned rooms with iPod docks. Guadalajara Expo Exhibition Centre is just 5 minutes walking. At the Clarum 101, each room provides satellite TV. For guests’ convenience, a hairdryer, slippers and work desk are also available in the rooms. La Gran Plaza Shopping Centre is situated less than 3 km from the hotel. Guadalajara Airport is 12 km away.

name: Hotel Tötem Guadalajara
description: No description found

name: The Westin Guadalajara
address: Avenida de las Rosas 2911, 44530 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: The second largest city in Mexico and the capital of the state of Jalisco, Guadalajara is a vibrant, vital city encompassing modern urban development, colonial architecture and a rich cultural heritage. The Westin Guadalajara is perfectly integrated into this graceful metropolis full of tree-lined avenues and fountains offering pet-friendly hotel rooms for traveling groups and families. Located in the prestigious Residencial del Bosque district directly across from Expo Guadalajara convention center, a major venue for events, exhibitions, congresses and conventions, The Westin Guadalajara helps you hit your stride with a convenient location near La Perla, Plaza del Sol and Grand Plaza, World Trade Center and Jewelry Center, parks, corporate offices and more.Marriott

name: Quinta Real Guadalajara
address: Av. Mexico 2727 Col. Vallarta Norte, 44690 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Situated in a residential area, this luxurious hotel offers spacious suite-style accommodations just 20 minutes from downtown Guadalajara and its exciting attractions, shopping and dining. Quinta Real features antique-style furniture, original works of art, and ivy-covered, pink stone walls. Relax in the outdoor swimming pool in the hot afternoon sun, then enjoy a delicious meal in the gourmet restaurant. The accommodations offer marble bathrooms and tubs, his and hers bathrobes and slippers, pillow menu and Salvatore Ferragamo bath accessories to complete the Quinta Real experience.

name: Hotel Boutique Abad
address: Mixcoatl 524, Ciudad Del Sol, 45050 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Featuring free WiFi, Hotel Boutique Abad offers Adults-Only accommodation in Guadalajara. Free private parking is available on site. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain rooms include a seating area for your convenience. You will find a coffee machine in the room. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guadalajara Cathedral is 7 km from Hotel Boutique Abad, while Plaza del Sol is 600 metres away. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 18 km from the property.

name: Hotel Puerta Del Sol Guadalajara
address: Avenida Lopez Mateos Sur 4205, 45087 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Located a short walk from Plaza del Sol in downtown Guadalajara, Mexico, this hotel features an outdoor pool and an on-site restaurant and bar. Rooms offer free Wi-Fi. Hotel Puerta Del Sol Guadalajara provides accommodations equipped with air conditioning, cable TV, and a DVD player. The bathroom features marble countertops and a hairdryer. A safety deposit box is provided and room service is available. A gym and business center make up part of the facilities at this Guadalajara Hotel Puerta del Sol. A buffet breakfast is served daily. Laundry and dry cleaning facilities are available. Don Miguel Hidalgo International Airport is 30 minutes' drive from Hotel Puerta Del Sol Guadalajara. Guadalajara Zoo is 25 minutes from the hotel.

name: VL Hotel Boutique by Rotamundos
description: In a prime location in the centre of Guadalajara, VL Hotel Boutique by Rotamundos provides free WiFi throughout the property, a terrace and free private parking for guests who drive. This 3-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The hotel features family rooms. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. VL Hotel Boutique by Rotamundos offers certain units that include a patio, and all rooms come with a coffee machine. Speaking English and Spanish at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Expiatorio Temple is 1.1 km from the accommodation, while Jose Cuervo Express Train is 3.2 km away. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 19 km from VL Hotel Boutique by Rotamundos.

name: Hotel Real de Castilla
address: 184 Calle Colón Zona Centro, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Well set in Guadalajara, Hotel Real de Castilla provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Mexican cuisine. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, every room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units include a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near Hotel Real de Castilla include Guadalajara Cathedral, Expiatorio Temple and Cabanas Cultural Institute. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: NH Collection Guadalajara Providencia
description: The NH Collection Guadalajara Providencia hotel is situated in the city’s financial district and boasts a unique glass façade. The hotel is within walking distance of the Pablo Neruda Park, cinema, and casinos and across the street is the Golf and Country Club, Guadalajara’s top golf course. It is also close to many popular attractions including the Instituto Cultural Cabañas, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The plaza that houses the hotel has a variety of restaurants, bars, and venues. The modern rooms at NH Collection Guadalajara Providencia are large and comfortable and finished with touches such as contemporary art and sleek wooden floors. Each comes with sound proof windows, a spacious bathroom, extra comfortable mattresses, and a choice of pillows. The Junior Suite has a private terrace, while luxury corner rooms come with stunning views thanks to the floor-to-ceiling windows. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Our restaurant serves a scrumptious breakfast buffet each morning, and for lunch and dinner, we offer delectable international meals or snacks along with drinks at our bar. There is a fitness center and spa, and we also have six meeting rooms.NH Hoteles

name: Suites Chapultepec
description: Ideally located in the centre of Guadalajara, Suites Chapultepec offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. The property is around 2.8 km from Cabanas Cultural Institute, 3.6 km from Jose Cuervo Express Train and 5.6 km from Jalisco Stadium. The accommodation features room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe. All rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, while certain rooms also offer a kitchenette equipped with a microwave. At Suites Chapultepec, the rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Expiatorio Temple, Guadalajara Cathedral and Revolution Park. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 19 km from Suites Chapultepec.

name: Suites Navata
address: Avenida Rinconada de Las Praderas 2170, 44530 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Set in Guadalajara, within 4.8 km of Jose Cuervo Express Train and 6.3 km of Guadalajara Cathedral, Suites Navata features free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 7.2 km from Cabanas Cultural Institute, 11 km from Jalisco Stadium and 15 km from Guadalajara Zoo. The property is non-smoking and is situated 4.6 km from Expiatorio Temple. The hotel features a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. The rooms have a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near Suites Navata include Guadalajara World Trade Center, Guadalajara Expo and Plaza del Sol. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Guadalajara Centro Historico
description: We're at downtown's center, a few blocks' walk to Guadalajara Cathedral, Degollado Theater, museums, and bustling markets. Join us in our top-floor restaurant and bar overlooking this historic city. Our meeting spaces offer panoramic views, and several rooms and suites have an outdoor terrace. We'll meet you at arrival with a warm DoubleTree cookie.Hilton

name: Hotel Indigo Guadalajara Expo, An IHG Hotel
address: Av.Adolfo Lopez Mateos Sur 1280., 45040 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Discover a fusion of classic Mexican and contemporary styles at Hotel Indigo Guadalajara Expo. Our modern boutique hotel is only five minutes from Expo Guadalajara and the World Trade Center, and nine kilometers from central Guadalajara. We are just moments from Guadalajara’s top attractions, like Instituto Cultural Cabañas, Parque Agua Azul, and the architectural brilliance of the Guadalajara Cathedral. Encircling a picturesque courtyard, our hotel offers curated experiences with a local vibe Savor Mexican cuisine at JAL Cocina de Raíz or pop up to the rooftop bar with sweeping views. Host a meeting or event in our versatile venues and ballroom. Relax in refreshed rooms with premium bedding. From fitness to dining, enjoy an enriching stay.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Six Hotel Guadalajara Degollado
address: Paseo Degollado 85 Zona Centro, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Ideally set in the Centro district of Guadalajara, Six Hotel Guadalajara Degollado is set 400 metres from Guadalajara Cathedral, 1.9 km from Expiatorio Temple and 3.3 km from Jose Cuervo Express Train. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is 1 km from Cabanas Cultural Institute, and within less than 1 km of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Popular points of interest near Six Hotel Guadalajara Degollado include Centros Joyeros, Guadalajara Wax Museum and Mariachi Square. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Suites Bq
description: Offering accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning and flat-screen TV, Suites BQ is set 6.2 km from Expiatorio Temple and 8 km from Cabanas Cultural Institute. Private parking is available on site. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Jalisco Stadium is 8.1 km from the aparthotel, while Guadalajara Cathedral is 8.4 km away. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 24 km from Suites BQ.

name: Hotel Perla Central
address: Av. Corona #450 Col. Centro, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Hotel Perla Central is located 300 metres from Guadalajara historic centre and 200 metres from Jardín de San Francisco. Free WiFi access is available in room, restaurant and lobby, american buffet breakfast is offered with a supplement. The rooms here will provide you with flat screen and cable TV, air conditioning and a bathroom with free toiletries and shower. Free national phone calls are also available. A complete gym is also available from 7am. At Hotel Perla Central you will find free valet parking, concierge services and multilingual staff. San Juan Market is located only 1 km away from the hotel. The hotel is 6.5 km from Guadalajara Expo and 1.4 km from Morelos Park. Don Miguel Hidalgo International Airport is 17 km away.

name: Fulton Business Luxury Hotel
address: 1450 Av. De Las Américas Country Club, 44610 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Located in Guadalajara, 5.3 km from Expiatorio Temple, FULTON Business Luxury HOTEL provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. Every room is equipped with air conditioning, a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at the hotel have a balcony. An American breakfast is available daily at FULTON Business Luxury HOTEL. Cabanas Cultural Institute is 7 km from the accommodation, while Jalisco Stadium is 7.2 km away. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 23 km from FULTON Business Luxury HOTEL.

name: City Express Plus by Marriott Guadalajara Providencia
address: 1520 Av. de Las Américas Country Club, 44610 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Hotel City Express Plus by Marriott Providencia is located in Guadalajara's new financial district, which is the headquarters of the most important economic segments in the state.For those who like to shop and enjoy good restaurants, we are strategically located very close to the Midtown mall, Punto Sao Paulo, Plaza Patria, Andares and Plaza Galerias which are 5 minutes away by car. Enjoy the heart of Jalisco with its emblematic Cathedral, visit some of the historical buildings such as: El Teatro Degollado, Hospicio Cabañas, as well as the famous San Juan de Dios Market, since we are less than 30 minutes away. Jalisco is the cradle of champions and for this reason sports are very important. You will find the Akron soccer stadium 20 minutes away, the new Los Charros Baseball Stadium and the Jalisco Stadium 15 minutes away respectively. But if golf is your thing, you'll find the Guadalajara Country Club just 5 minutes away.Marriott

name: Country Hotel & Suites
address: Av Circunvalacion Jorge Alvarez Del, Castillo #1482, 44260 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Featuring free Wi-Fi and an indoor swimming pool, Country Hotel & Suites has well-equipped suites with kitchens. Located in Guadalajara’s Lomas del Country district, it offers free parking. Each suite at the Country Hotel & Suites features traditional décor and tiled floors. All come with a living area, where there is satellite TV and a sofa. Kitchens come with a dining area. There is a selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in the centre of Guadalajara, less than 2 km from the hotel. Country Hotel & Suites has easy access to the Mex 80 Motorway and is just 500 metres from Avila Camacho Railway Station. Guadalajara Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Mesón San Felipe
description: Situated in Guadalajara, 200 metres from the centre and less than 1 km from Guadalajara Cathedral, Mesón San Felipe features accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. Some units have a seating area and/or a terrace. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Expiatorio Temple, Cabanas Cultural Institute and Revolution Park. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 19 km from Mesón San Felipe.

name: Casa Ixaya by Barrio México
description: No description found

name: JW Marriott Hotel Guadalajara
address: Mar Baltico 2242 Colonia Country Club, 44610 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Surround yourself with refined luxury at JW Marriott Hotel Guadalajara, where a truly enriching getaway awaits. Located in the city of Guadalajara, Jalisco, our luxury hotel offers easy access to a host of business offices, as well as shopping and entertainment options. Soak up the sun as you take a dip in our pool and enjoy unobstructed views of Guadalajara. Delight your palate with our various restaurant options – including Zibu, which draws upon the cuisines of Thailand and Mexico. After an exciting day in the city, settle in to your spacious, pet-friendly room or suite, boasting luxury bedding and sophisticated décor. After an eventful day, sip a glass of champagne while relaxing on the Sunset Deck, our exclusive rooftop bar. From chef-made specialties to modern rooms, JW Marriott Hotel Guadalajara focuses on your well-being.Marriott

name: Ramada Encore by Wyndham Guadalajara Aeropuerto
address: Av Solidaridad Iberoamericana 6500 Col. Las Pintitas, 45693 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Ramada Encore by Wyndham Guadalajara Aeropuerto is a newly built property ideally located only 5 minutes away from international airport. This 148 room property is the perfect option for business travellers, due to its proximity and easy access to major companies and industrial areas in the city. Guests will enjoy a complimentary breakfast served daily, and can keep up with their exercise routine on the fitness center and relax in the indoor heated pool. Ramada Encore by Wyndham Guadalajara Aeropuerto offers Free WiFi and Free parking and the 148 guest rooms include safe, flat screen tv and coffee machine.Wyndham

name: Hotel Malibu
description: Situated next to Gran Plaza Shopping Centre, Hotel Malibu offers a spa, sauna, gym and outdoor pool surrounded by gardens. Free WiFi is available throughout. Decorated in bright colours, the Malibu’s air-conditioned rooms include flat-screen cable TV, a minibar, coffee maker and safe. A hairdryer and amenities are provided in the private bathrooms. Typical Mexican dishes and international cuisine are served in the hotel’s La Fuente restaurant. Guests can also relax with a drink in the lobby bar, or outside on the terrace. Free private parking can be found at Hotel Malibu. Guadalajara Cathedral and Plaza Universidad Square are around 6 km away while Guadalajara Airport is a 20-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Barcelo Guadalajara
address: Avenida De Las Rosas 2933, 44540 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: No description found

name: Casa Bosque Eduviges
address: Calle José Guadalupe Zuno 2058, 44140 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Situated in Guadalajara and with Expiatorio Temple reachable within 1.4 km, Casa Bosque Eduviges features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a restaurant. The property is located 4.4 km from Cabanas Cultural Institute, 4.8 km from Guadalajara Cathedral and 7.6 km from Jalisco Stadium. The property is 2.3 km from the city centre and 3.2 km from Jose Cuervo Express Train. At the hotel rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a desk, a patio with a garden view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. All rooms have a safety deposit box, while certain rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also boast city views. The rooms have a wardrobe. Guests at Casa Bosque Eduviges can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help. Guadalajara Zoo is 13 km from the accommodation, while Revolution Park is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 19 km from Casa Bosque Eduviges.

address: 1041 C. Manuel López Cotilla Americana, 44160 Guadalajara, Jalisco

name: Hotel Boutique Casa Elefante

name: Hotel Belisario
description: Located in Guadalajara, 2.3 km from Cabanas Cultural Institute, Hotel Belisario INN provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.5 km from Jalisco Stadium. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms at Hotel Belisario INN include air conditioning and a wardrobe. Guadalajara Cathedral is 3.9 km from the accommodation, while Guadalajara Zoo is 5.4 km away. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 19 km from Hotel Belisario INN.

name: Hotel Estancia Business Class
address: Av. Mariano Otero No. 2407, 45050 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Offering an a la carte restaurant and buffet restaurant, Hotel La Estancia is located in Zapopan, just a short 5-minute walk from the popular Expo Guadalajara convention centre. Free Wi-Fi access is available. The rooms at this hotel are air-conditioned and come equipped with a cable TV and a private bathroom with a shower, toilet and towels. At Hotel La Estancia you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a terrace. Other facilities offered include a tour desk. Guadalajara City Centre is a 20-minute drive from the property, while the popular Plaza del Sol shopping centre is 150 metres away.

name: Suites Internacional
description: Hotel Suites Internacional has 24 rooms. All of them have an integrated full equipped kitchen. The hotel is located in one of the most beautiful residential areas of the city just 5 minute walking distance to various restaurants, supermarkets, malls, etc.

name: Hampton Inn by Hilton Guadalajara/Expo
address: Avenida De Las Rosas 3030, 44500 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Guadalajara Jalisco is known as La PerlaTapatía including Zapopan Tlaquepaque and Tonalá are the Metropolitan Zone The Tequila Mariachi and Charrería are the symbols that identify us at a national and international level born and raised in this land. Guadalajara has become the second more important city of the country with the vocation for the Business Tourism and important Congress Conventions and Specials Events, whether national or international. Hampton Inn by Hilton Guadalajara Expo is conveniently located just 5 minutes away from Expo Guadalajara 30 minutes away from The International Airport Miguel Hidalgo. Located on López Mateos Avenue in one of the most representative neighborhoods Colonia Chapalita where you can enjoy a delicious dinner in one of the many luxury restaurants bars and coffee shops. It is 20 minutes away from downtown and other different touristic and cultural attractions. Hampton Inn Guadalajara Expo embraces their visitors at the arrival time with a peaceful atmosphere and warmth. The Fitness Room has all the necessary equipment to begin an active morning. Our 24 hours business center, and one meeting room for business. In addition the hotel has a terrace where Guests can Relax. Our Rooms offer all the necessary commodities for the business traveler: clean fresh and comfortable rooms. Also discover our famous Hampton Bed and take a delicious Breakfast on House Wifi access All this makes Hampton Inn by Hilton Guadalajara Expo the perfect place for Business Trip.Hilton

name: Hotel Ronda Minerva
address: Av Lopez Mateos Sur 265, 44520 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: This garden oasis is centrally located minutes from Expo Guadalajara Convention Centre, as well as the city's best restaurants and shopping. It features an on-site restaurant and rooms with Wi-Fi. Each room is equipped with satellite TV at Hotel Ronda Minerva. A radio is also included. Hotel Ronda Minerva features an outdoor pool. Guests can relax in the garden, and then enjoy Mexican cuisine and cocktails in the hotel's Al Eden restaurant. The area surrounding the Arborea is filled with attractions and activities including the Museum of Arts which is 4.8 km away. Shopping and dining in Plaza del Sol and Gran Plaza Shopping Centres is a short drive away.

name: Free Spirit Hostel Guadalajara
address: 124 Calle Maestranza Zona Centro, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 5 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads. Conveniences include desks and fans, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages. Additional amenities at this hostal include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a communal living room. address: Carretera a Chapala No. 7012 las P, 45690 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: At the Hampton Inn Guadalajara Airport Mexico hotel, we know what it is like to be on the road or in the air. Places to fly, people to impress, deadlines to meet, which is why staying at our Hampton Inn hotel is a good idea. We are located only 7 miles from the Miguel Hidalgo International Airport. Our Hampton Inn Guadalajara Airport Mexico hotel is located in a well-established and developed industrial area. The Hampton Inn Guadalajara Airport Mexico hotel ''perfect mix lobby'', well-equipped fitness center and business center with complimentary high-speed internet access makes it the perfect place for business or leisure. Not far from the hotel, in the heart of Guadalajara, is the Historical Center, the city's cultural hub and its magnificent buildings, such as the Instituto Cultural Cabanas named as ''World Heritage Site''. Also in the same area you can find numerous museums, cathedrals and landmarks. Guadalajara, Mexico is known worldwide for its traditional hospitality, with a wide variety of cultural and recreational attractions and delicious cuisine. But most of all, it is known for its people. More than just a city, it represents Mexican culture with its folklore, the renowned Mariachi handcrafts, tequila and the national sport, charreria. Contemporary Guadalajara represents modern Mexico in the strength of its economic, industrial, commercial and service infrastructure. The modern section of the city offers an excellent selection of stores where guests of the Hampton Inn Guadalajara Airport Mexico hotel will find a great variety of clothing, footwear, accessories and gifts. Few cities can offer such a variety of interesting things to see and do, involving the visitors in a cultural historical and legendary atmosphere. Guadalajara is a unique place that is sure to impress even the most demanding traveler. So come check into the Hampton Inn Guadalajara Aeropuerto. We love having you here at the Hampton Inn Guadalajara Airport hotel in Mexico!Hilton

name: Holiday Inn Express Guadalajara Expo
description: Holiday Inn Express® Near Expo Guadalajara Located near major companies, such as Siemens, Flex, HP Inc; Continental and HP Enterprise, which makes the Holiday Inn Express® Guadalajara Expo Hotel the smart choice for those who travel for business. Two of the most important convention and exhibition venues in the city, Expo Guadalajara and The World Trade Center Guadalajara, are less than one mile away. For those who travel for leisure, touristic places like the beautiful, quaint town of Tlaquepaque is an excellent option, or the Magic Town of Tequila, where this world-famous liquor is produced, are within an hour driving distance. A few minutes away, visit the Historic Guadalajara Downtown area, and be amazed by its architecture and flea markets. Spend a day at Plaza del Sol shopping mall and find everything you need, located right across the street of the hotel. The Business Center will help you stay ahead of work, continue working with free high-speed Internet access throughout our facilities, and host meetings in our event rooms. Keep up your energy levels by exercising in the Fitness Center or enjoy a refreshing swim in our outdoor pool. Take a rest in the comfortable guestrooms with laundry and same-day dry cleaning services, and have a good breakfast from our complimentary, daily, morning buffet bar.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel La Mansion del Sol
description: This traditional Mexican house is located in Guadalajara, just 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza del Sol Shopping Centre. It offers a fitness centre and a charming garden with a fountain. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel La Mansion del Sol feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen cable TV and a coffee maker. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Looking out onto the garden, the hotel’s Los Colibrís Restaurant serves traditional Mexican food. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The hotel offers free valet parking. Don Miguel Hidalgo y Costilla Airport is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Roma Guadalajara in downtown

Roma Inn’s air-conditioned rooms feature parquet flooring and extra large beds. All are equipped with a TV, and ironing and coffee or tea-making facilities. The bathroom includes toiletries and a hairdryer. The hotel has a restaurant, sun terrace and a business centre including several meeting rooms. The city’s major landmarks, including Teatro Degollado and the Cathedral are within 5-10 minutes’ walk of the Roma Inn. Guadalajara International Airport is about 20 km away.

name: Casa del Retoño
description: This colourful, Mexican-style bed and breakfast in Tlaquepaque offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor seating area with tropical gardens. Casa del Retoño is just 6 km from Guadalajara's historic centre. Each room at this property comes with Mexican-style decor, a full bathroom and a cable TV. They also feature free toiletries, while some include a balcony with garden views. There are several restaurants serving national and international cuisine within 600 metres of the property, and Juarez Food Market is about 570 metres away. El Parian Pavilion, where guests will find bars, food stands and artisanal products is 300 metres from Casa del Retoño. The historic Nuestra Señora de la Soledad church and Jardin Hidalgo Park are both within a 5-minute walk. Guadalajara’s International Airport is a 20-minute drive from the property.

name: Hotel Laffayette Ejecutivo
description: Featuring free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool, Hotel Lafayette is situated less than 1 km from the centre of Guadalajara. It offers free parking and a restaurant. The Lafayette has simple, traditional décor. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has a flat-screen TV. A continental breakfast is served in the Lafayette’s restaurant. Mexican and international cuisine is on offer for dinner. Hotel Lafayette is less than 500 metres from the US Consulate and the University of Guadalajara. The Mex 80 and 54 Motorways can be reached in 5 minutes, by car.

name: Aranzazu Eco
address: Av Revolucion 120 Col Centro, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Aranzazu Eco is located a short distance from several beautiful monuments such as the Cathedral, la Rotonda de los Hombres Ilustres and the San Juan de Dios market. This hotel is also an excellent option if you travel to Guadalajara on business due to its location in the heart of the city and the array of ballrooms available for executive events, business meetings or conventions.

name: Hotel Arboledas Expo
address: Paseo de la Arboleda # 1302, 44510 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Set in Guadalajara's business district and close to Guadalajara Airport, this hotel features on-site dining options along with comfortable guestrooms featuring free wireless internet access. Hotel Arboledas Expo's El Ruiseñor restaurant serves traditional Mexican cuisine, and room service is available on request. The hotel also offers 24-hour front desk service. The Arboledas Expo Hotel is ideally placed adjacent to the Arboledas Expo Center. Plaza del Sol Square is also a short walk away. The World Trade Center is also easily accessible.

name: Hotel Atia
description: No description found

name: Hotel Occidental
address: Calle General Villagómez Zona Centro, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Well located in the centre of Guadalajara, Hotel Occidental provides free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around 2.7 km from Jose Cuervo Express Train, 4.5 km from Jalisco Stadium and 7.2 km from Guadalajara Zoo. Mariachi Square is 300 metres from the hotel and Guadalajara Wax Museum is 500 metres away. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. Hotel Occidental can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Guadalajara Cathedral, Cabanas Cultural Institute and Expiatorio Temple. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 17 km from Hotel Occidental.

name: Check Inn Hostal Aeropuerto Gdl
address: 3030 Av.de la Solidaridad Iberoamericana, 45640 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Situated in Guadalajara, within 17 km of Jose Cuervo Express Train and 19 km of Guadalajara Cathedral, CHECK INN HOSTAL AEROPUERTO GDL features accommodation with a garden and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is located 19 km from Expiatorio Temple, 19 km from Cabanas Cultural Institute and 23 km from Jalisco Stadium. The guest house has family rooms. Rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, and some rooms at the guest house have a terrace. At CHECK INN HOSTAL AEROPUERTO GDL the rooms have a shared bathroom. Guadalajara Zoo is 29 km from the accommodation, while UTEG University is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 2 km from CHECK INN HOSTAL AEROPUERTO GDL.

name: Casa Zapopan Hotel
address: 228 Avenida Manuel Ávila Camacho, 45150 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Casa Zapopan Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Guadalajara Suburbs area. The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Casa Zapopan Hotel. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Guadalajara, Casa Zapopan Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Hotel Real Zapopan
description: Set in the centre of Zapopan, close to Guadalajara's modern financial zone and some of its exclusive shopping centres, Hotel Real Zapopan features free Wi-Fi in public areas. It has a gym and a sauna. Hotel Real Zapopan offers air-conditioned rooms with modern décor. They offer flat-screen cable TV, a desk, a private bathroom and a telephone with free local calls. Local restaurants can be found within 10 minutes’ walk. The Real Zapopan is just a 5-minute drive from Auditorio Telmex auditorium, and a 10-minute drive from Plaza Andares, which offers a wide range of national and international brands. The city centre is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Zar Guadalajara
description: Free Wi-Fi, free parking and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen cable TV are offered at Zar Guadalajara. Situated a 15-minute drive from central Guadalajara, the hotel offers direct access to the MEX15 Motorway. Each spacious room at Zar Guadalajara offers a work desk and ironing facilities under request at the front desk. The private bathrooms come with amenities. The hotel has a café, where you can enjoy drinks and snacks. There is also a 24-hour reception. La Venta del Astillero Golf Course is just 4.5 km from the hotel. Guadalajara Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Emperador centro Guadalajara y Remodelado
description: Set in Guadalajara, 1.7 km from Guadalajara Cathedral and a block away from the Globo Children's Museum, Hotel Emperador centro Guadalajara y Remodelado features free WiFi access and free private parking. The rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. For your comfort, you will find slippers and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Central Bus Station is a few steps from Hotel Emperador centro Guadalajara y Remodelado, while Diana Theatre is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 16 km from the property.

name: Hotel Riu Plaza Guadalajara
address: Av. Lopez Mateos 830 Col. Chapalita, Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Hotel Riu Plaza Guadalajara is situated 1.5 km from Expo Guadalajara Exhibition Centre and free WiFi is offered throughout. Riu Plaza Guadalajara’s air-conditioned rooms have dark wood furniture and stylish, colourful décor. They have free WiFi, a flat-screen cable TV and a seating area. Each room includes a free minibar on arrival, coffee-making facilities and free water. Breakfast Buffet avaible, while the hotel's 2 restaurants offer both buffet and à la carte cuisine. There is also a deli corner with a takeaway service. Guests can enjoy a drink in the lobby bar or the poolside lounge bar. Hotel Riu Plaza Guadalajara is a 15-minute drive from Guadalajara Cathedral and the historic city centre. Gran Plaza Shopping Centre is only 2 km away.

name: OYO Hotel Brazil,guadalajara,estadio Jalisco
description: Situated in Guadalajara, the hotel is an easy drive from Estadio Jalisco and Guadalajara Zoo. It also offers luggage storage, a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. The hotel's rooms are comfortable and provide a kitchenette that is equipped with a refrigerator. Each have ironing facilities, a ceiling fan and a private bathroom with a shower. The hotel provides easy access to Guadalajara Cathedral and University of Guadalajara. It is also a brief car trip from San Juan de Dios Market and Universidad Autonoma de Guadalajara.Revato

Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a 24-hour fitness center. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Property Location In the heart of Tlaquepaque, Hotel Posada Virreyes is within a 5-minute drive of Regional Ceramic Museum and San Pedro Parish. This hotel is 1.9 mi (3.1 km) from Plaza de Toros El Centenario and 2.5 mi (4 km) from Plaza Forum Tlaquepaque. Dining Grab a bite at La Terraza, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the 2 coffee shops/cafés. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. name: Holiday Inn Guadalajara Expo
description: Holiday Inn® Guadalajara Expo Plaza Del Sol excellent location in front of the commercial development LA PERLA DISTRICT, also Liverpool Just a few minutes from shopping malls like; La Gran Plaza, Plaza Galerías, La Gourmetería, Punto Sur; Among other recreation centers, it makes us an excellent option for your family trips, enjoy your stay in comfortable rooms with beautiful views of the city or our heated pool, restaurant with buffet breakfast omelette station and diverse dishes and international food, gym, WiFi in all areas, laundry self-service, among other services that will make your stay unique. Located on two main arteries of the city Av. Lopez Mateos and Av. Mariano Otero, close to Teatro Galerias, World Trade Center Guadalajara and Expo Guadalajara headquarters of FIL, CIA, FASTENER FAIR, SIPA, ICPA, AMECIP, OBA, APM, MEXTESOL, SFM, Ferretera. We are 3km from Periférico Sur which allows for great mobility around the entire city and easy transfer to ITESO Industrial Zone, Technology Park, Guadalajara Industrial Park, Business Center Concentro, as well as to sporting events Akron Stadium, Jalisco Stadium, Scotiabank Aquatic Center, Charros Stadium. Surrounded by important hospitals such as Hospital Santa Maria Chapalita, Hospital Real San Jose among others. address: Gigantes 287, Col. San Juan de Dios, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco

The property is 1.7 km from the city centre and 1.4 km from Guadalajara Cathedral. At the hotel, each room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units include a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near Hotel Gallo include Libertad Market, Centros Joyeros and Mariachi Square. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Casona Independencia
address: 1165 Calle Independencia Zona Centro, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Hotel Casona Independencia is ideally situated in the centre of Guadalajara, and features a terrace, free WiFi and a bar. The property is around 3 km from Cabanas Cultural Institute, 3.8 km from Jose Cuervo Express Train and 5.9 km from Jalisco Stadium. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Casona Independencia the rooms include bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub. Hotel Casona Independencia provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Expiatorio Temple, Guadalajara Cathedral and Revolution Park. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 19 km from Hotel Casona Independencia.

name: Hotel Platino Expo
address: Av. Platino 2471 Esquina Caracol, 44550 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Situated in Guadalajara, Hotel Platino Expo has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, restaurant, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 5.7 km from Expiatorio Temple, 5.8 km from Jose Cuervo Express Train and 7.3 km from Guadalajara Cathedral. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. At the hotel rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a terrace with pool view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The rooms in Hotel Platino Expo are fitted with free toiletries and an iPod docking station. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Staff at Hotel Platino Expo are available to provide advice at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Plaza del Sol, Guadalajara Expo and Guadalajara World Trade Center. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 18 km from Hotel Platino Expo.

name: Casa Madonna La Providence
description: Located 600 metres from Chapultepec Avenue, this charming boutique hotel offers a patio, roof garden and individually decorated rooms with free Wi-Fi. Casa Madonna La Providence is 2 km from Guadalajara Cathedral. Each air-conditioned room at the Casa Madonna La Providence features antique furniture and cable TV. All rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. You can enjoy international cuisine in Casa Madonna’s restaurant, open from 07:00 until 23:00 daily. The hotel also offers a bar and a room service menu. A range of shops, restaurants and lively bars can be found on nearby Chapultepec Avenue, while Centro Magno Shopping Centre and La Minerva Roundabout are a 5-minute drive away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Candlewood Suites Guadalajara Galerias
address: Av. Manuel J. Clouthier #253, Int. 70,Col. Residencial Cordilleras, 45039 Zapopan, Jalisco
description: Ideal location, fresh design and safety, it’s what our guests find when staying at Candlewood Suites®️ Guadalajara Galerias! Perfect for business or just a relaxing getaway. Enjoy our spacious and modern suites designed for a comfortable stay. We have easy access to major points of the city including Andares or Galerias Shopping Mall and Akron Stadium (Chivas), close to the most important Industrial Parks, Corporate Offices, just 15 miles from Miguel Hidalgo International Guadalajara Airport and 5 miles from Historic Center. Candlewood Suites®️ Guadalajara Galerias is in walking distance to supermarkets and a mall with several restaurant options for all tastes. We know how important it is to be connected, that is why we offer high-speed free Wi-Fi access in all areas of the hotel. Business center, Candlewood Cupboard®️ Store, Gym, Self Service laundry and our Lending Locker that is stocked with kitchen items, games and small appliances that you can borrow, are available 24 hours. Guadalajara and Zapopan has a lot of historical monuments, theaters and museums, our Historic Center is the best place for you to relax and visit. Tequila is a must-visit Magic Town in Mexico. Its enigmatic landscapes and it is recognized for producing Mexico’s most famous beverage: tequila. Welcome to Candlewood Suites®️ Guadalajara Galerias! You can count on us to make you feel at home!IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Latino
address: Prisciliano Sanchez #74 Guadalajara Mexico, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Ideally set in Guadalajara, Hotel Latino features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and free private parking. This 2-star hotel offers a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 600 metres from Guadalajara Cathedral. All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All rooms have a private bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen. Popular points of interest near Hotel Latino include Cabanas Cultural Institute, Expiatorio Temple and Arena Coliseo Guadalajara. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Country Plaza
description: Centrally located in western Mexico's financial district, near the corporate offices in Guadalajara, this hotel in Zapopan, Jalisco offers enjoyable facilities and delicious, on-site dining options. Country Plaza features an indoor swimming pool and a hot tub. The hotel also features a well-equipped gym for guests to stay in shape while away from home. Guests can start the day with a buffet breakfast in the Country Plaza's Claro de Luna restaurant. Breakfast features the best Mexican cuisine in town with a variety of cereals, fresh juice and seasonal fruits. For lunch, Claro de Luna offers delicious menu items such as shrimp and steak with almond sauce and country-style chicken breast.

name: Hostal Santuario de las Libelulas
address: 447 Avenida Fray Antonio Alcalde, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Conveniently located in the centre of Guadalajara, Santuario de las Libelulas offers free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is around 3 km from Expiatorio Temple, 3.9 km from Jalisco Stadium and 4.7 km from Jose Cuervo Express Train. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.9 km from Cabanas Cultural Institute. At the guest house, all rooms have a balcony. Popular points of interest near Santuario de las Libelulas include Guadalajara Cathedral, Morelos Park and Centros Joyeros. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Blue Pepper Hostel Chapultepec
description: Blue Pepper Hostel is located in Guadalajara’s Chapultepec district, known for its bars and cafés. Within a 10-minute drive of the historic city centre, the hostel offers 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. Accommodation is in rooms or dormitories. All dormitories have bunk beds, lockers and a shared bathroom either inside or outside the dormitory. Rooms feature a wardrobe and a private bathroom with a shower or bath tub. There is a communal kitchen and a lounge with satellite TV. The hostel also has a terrace. San Juan de Dios Market is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Posada Santa Fe
description: Located in Guadalajara, 10 km from Expiatorio Temple, Hotel Posada Santa Fe provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and free WiFi. Certain rooms at the property include a balcony with a garden view. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a patio. Each room includes a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms have a kitchen fitted with a fridge. At Hotel Posada Santa Fe each room comes with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Jose Cuervo Express Train is 10 km from the accommodation, while Jalisco Stadium is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 24 km from Hotel Posada Santa Fe.

name: Bellwort Hotel
description: Set in Guadalajara, 1.8 km from Expiatorio Temple, Bellwort Hotel offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a coffee machine, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also feature a city view. Jose Cuervo Express Train is 3.4 km from Bellwort Hotel, while Cabanas Cultural Institute is 4.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel de Mendoza
description: Located in the charming historic district of Guadalajara, Mexico, the Hotel de Mendoza offers guests a peaceful setting while exploring the attractions of this historic city. Guests can take advantage of Hotel de Mendoza's inviting pool with hot tub, or get fit in the exercise center. The hotel's La Forja Restaurant offers guests fine Mexican and international cuisine in a sophisticated atmosphere. Historic colonial buildings surround Hotel de Mendoza. Guests can explore the Degollado Theatre, the Metropolitan Cathedral and the Regional Museum within minutes of the hotel.

name: Guadalajara Plaza Ejecutivo Lopez Mateos
address: Avenida Lopez Mateos Sur 2128, 45050 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Only moments from downtown Guadalajara attractions, including the Degollado Theatre, this hotel offers a lush tropical atmosphere along with comfortable accommodations and an on-site restaurant. Hotel Guadalajara Plaza Ejecutivo Lopez Mateos ideally places guests only 3 blocks from the Plaza del Sol shopping center. Historical monuments, including Guadalajara Cathedral are also only a short distance away. Guests staying here can enjoy traditional Mexican cuisine at the hotel's on-site restaurant or cocktails from the lobby bar. The hotel also features an outdoor swimming pool along with a modern business center.

name: Hotel NV Guadalajara
description: No description found

name: Hard Rock Hotel Guadalajara
address: Av. Ignacio L. Vallarta 5145, 45040 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Located in Guadalajara, 7 km from Guadalajara Cathedral, Hard Rock Hotel Guadalajara features an outdoor swimming pool, as well as free WiFi. 10 km from Jalisco Stadium and 4.9 km from Expo Guadalajara, the property features a fitness centre and a garden. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, buffet and à la carte options. There is an on-site restaurant, which serves a variety of international dishes. Hard Rock Hotel Guadalajara offers a sauna. Guests have access to the on-site business centre and can use the on-site ATM machine. La Gran Plaza Fashion Mall is 1.1 km from the accommodation, while Passport Office is 2 km away. Guadalajara Airport is 20 km from the property.

name: Olga Querida B&B Hostal
description: Free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and spacious rooms and dormitories with a ceiling fan are offered at this charming guest house. Plaza de Armas Square and Guadalajara Cathedral are a 10-minute walk away. Olga Querida B&B Hostal offers beds in airy dorms, complete with storage lockers, sheets and towels. Private rooms include an en suite bathroom and access to a courtyard seating area. A daily continental breakfast is served in the Olga Querida’s lounge or outside on the terrace. You can also prepare meals in the shared kitchen. Nuestra Señora del Carmen Sanctuary is just 150 metres away, while Juarez Metro Station is 3 blocks away. Staff at the reception can provide information about the city in Spanish or English.

name: Hotel Guadalajara Country Club by HNF
address: Av De Las Americas 1528, 44610 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Set in a prime location of Guadalajara, Aloft Guadalajara puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Aloft Guadalajara. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Aloft Guadalajara is an excellent choice from which to explore Guadalajara or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: Hotel Vagabundo Expo Guadalajara
description: Located in Guadalajara, 5.3 km from Expiatorio Temple, Hotel Vagabundo Expo Guadalajara provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 5.4 km from Jose Cuervo Express Train. At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe and a TV. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms have a kitchen fitted with a fridge. At Hotel Vagabundo Expo Guadalajara all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Guadalajara Expo, Guadalajara World Trade Center and Plaza del Sol. All our contemporary and comfortable guest rooms are designed to provide you an efficient experience for business traveling, including ergonomic chair, several spots for power connections, and comfy rooms for leisure guests.
